name: Beartrap - Nailed Shut 7" *PRE-ORDER*
description:
THIS IS A PRE-ORDER AND WILL SHIP WHEN THE VINYL ARRIVES FROM USA*


BearTrap Nailed Shut ep
16 tracks of short, fast, angry hardcore from Massachusetts USA.
Euro press with exclusive cover
For fans of: Trash Talk, Ceremony etc...
Available as a single 7'
or as a 4 x 7' pack with all the cover variants

*white (Black vinyl)
*green (mixed colour vinyl)
*red (mixed colour vinyl)
*grey (black vinyl)

LTD to 50

single 7' €4.50
4 pack €16

All orders of the 4 pack will ship with a free gift!!!!!

name: Rivals-Make Your Own Path /100
description:
This is the exclusive edition of the new RIVALS! full length Make Your Own Path.

It comes in an awesome recycled card fold up case which is all screeprinted by Vino Sangre with some amazing artwork.

If you like bands like Go It Alone, ON, Have Heart and Verse then you definitely need to check this band out!

All cases are hand numbered /100 get them while you still can!

name: Pariso - SoonerBetterInsignificant Vinyl
description:
Brand new 7" EP from London hardcore five-piece, Pariso. Features 7 tracks on random orange/green mix vinyl.

Tracklist:
Intro
Solitude
Fevered Egos
Birds
Mystifier
House of Squalor
Lonqvist

Pressing Info
- 400 on random orange/green mix

I am the only Irish retailer to stock this product

name: Snatch Demo CD LTD
description:
4 track demo from Achill Island based band Snatch. 
Recorded on 18th April 2010 in the bands own shed.

13 of these CDs made. 
Hand Numbered /13
Exclusive Art designed by Jack. 
With A limited heavy black card outer slipcase.
Each one is hand cut, hand painted and hand glued by the band themselves. 
Black Slipcase w/Bloodied White Inner CD, Handwritten Lyric Sheet,  Note from the band and a Photo.
The paint also contains the blood of the band members.

Each one is slightly different so they are one of a kind.

1. Dutch
2. Fall
3. Poetic Justice
4. Undividual
